description: Junior 1BR 4th floor walkup in Inwood. Nice people around and very easy to get around. Between the 1 and A train. 35 minutes to midtown.
name: Cozy Junior 1BR in inwood.
review: Communication with the host was great. Even being away on vacation he got a friend to help arrange our stay for the weekend. The apartment is even better once seen in person. Cozy compact place for two. Location might be a little secluded from the city but it wasn't a problem to travel given the Metro was at almost every corner.
